description: Table that holds the display data for each grouping and claim line tuple when Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) grouping is run through Epic for a claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim print record associated with a single hospital account/bucket.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APC_DISP_CLAIM_LINE
columns.description: This column stores the claim line number this display line for ambulatory payment classification (APC) grouping is aimed at.

columns.name: APC_DISP_TEXT
columns.description: The display text for the current display line in the detail display for APC grouping by Epic.

columns.name: APC_DISP_VALUE
columns.description: The dollar amount (or other value) for the current display line in the detail display for APC grouping by Epic.

columns.name: APC_DISP_FORMULA
columns.description: The formula text for the current display line in the detail display for APC grouping by Epic.

columns.name: APC_DISP_PMT_CLASS_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the grouping classification this display line is in reference to. Used to handle multiple sets of grouping results.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medicare PPS


Tricare PPS


NY Medicaid EPS


Medicare SNF PPS PDPM


External System
